configd:help.text: Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP)
Specify access-list that defines multicast groups that are exempted from being subject to configured limit
Configure the limit on the maximum number of group membership states
Enable SSM mapping on the router
Configure the static mode of defining SSM mapping
Configure access-list for the static mode of defining SSM mapping
Configure access-list for the static mode of defining SSM mapping
Configure source address to use for static map group
Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP)
Querier mode
Set forced querier mode
Period that router waits before assuming querier role
Enable off-link for IGMP
Configure a query interval value for IGMP
Immediate leave feature
Defines multicast groups in which the immediate leave feature is enabled
configure the robustness variable value on an interface
Specify access-list that defines multicast groups that are exempted from being subject to configured limit
Configure the limit on the maximum number of group membership states
configure the maximum response time advertised in IGMP queries
Set the last-member query-count value
Set standard IP Multicast group address to be configured as a static group member
Set standard IP Multicast group address to be configured as a static group member
Configure standard IP source address as a static source from where multicast packets originate
Configure a join multicast group
Configure a join multicast group
Standard IP source address to be configured as a source from where multicast packets originate
Configure the frequency at which the router sends IGMP group-specific host query messages
Configure the current IGMP protocol version on an interface
Control the multicast local-membership groups learnt on an interface
Enable strict RA (Router Advertisement) validation for IGMP
Configure the frequency of sending IGMP host query messages
Configure a startup query count for IGMP
